client_id.description: Your unique moltin client ID for your store. Can be found on the homepage of your store in dashboard.moltin.com

client_secret.description: Your moltin client secret for your store. Can be found on the homepage of your store in dashboard.moltin.com

service.description: Email service you are using to send the invoice i.e. gmail

user.description: full email address for the choen service

pass.description: password for the given user of the given email service

albumBucketName.description: The name of your s3 bucket
